# Word Associations

##### © 2025 Peter Overmann. All rights reserved.


<br>

This is a curated corpus of word associations, consisting of 65,108 entries with 1,888,505 associations. I created this collection to be used as training data for models of associative memory. The full list available in [CSV](WordAssociations.csv) format.
